name: A1K Runner Pet & Vehicle Art Pack
description: Programmatically generated art assets for A1K Runner enhanced UI system

pet_bolt_cyan_strip6_64x64.png.description: Cyan energy bolt projectile for pets

pet_bolt_purple_strip6_64x64.png.description: Purple lightning bolt projectile for pets

pet_claw_red_strip6_64x64.png.description: Red claw slash effect for melee pets

pet_bubble_purple_strip6_64x64.png.description: Purple bubble projectile with trailing effect

pet_rock_chip_strip6_64x64.png.description: Spinning rock projectile with dust trail

pet_feather_slash_strip6_64x64.png.description: Wind slash effect with floating feathers

veh_icon_bike_64.png.description: Bike vehicle icon (1 seat, speed boost)

veh_icon_car_64.png.description: Car vehicle icon (3 seats, armor boost)

veh_icon_fusion_64.png.description: Fusion vehicle icon (3 seats, special abilities)

vfx_sheets.usage: Use with VFX.spawn() system in gameplay-pets-vehicles.js

ui_icons.usage: Reference in VEH_TYPES configuration for button icons
